title: MNF Preview: Saints-Raiders Gambling Picks & DFS Advice (Football 9/21)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jordan Dajani to preview the final game of Week 2 as the Saints and the Raiders meet on Monday Night Football. It's the first time the Raiders will get to play in Vegas, but how much does that advantage actually matter these days? Will and Jordan share their game picks, best props to bet on and offer tips on how to construct that perfect DFS lineup. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @JordanDajani
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
